description: TACT patch index files downloaded from Blizzard CDN and decoded from BLTE containers
notes: Files were fetched as BLTE containers from the CDN data/ path using the encoding key (ekey).
The BLTE containers were decoded with cascette-py to produce the raw patch index data.
Content keys (ckey) verified via MD5 hash of the decoded data.
The patch-index format is not well documented. CascLib marks it as 'needs research'.
The patch-index is referenced by the 'patch-index' field in build configs.
It is NOT the same format as CDN archive .index files or patch archive .index files.

header_analysis.description: Preliminary structure analysis. Format is not fully documented.

known_fields.0x08 LE u32: total file size (matches actual decoded size)

uncertain_fields.0x0C-0x2A: 31 bytes of format parameters, mostly constant across files. Includes BE u32 values: 0x01000003, 1, 7, 2. Some fields vary with file size.
uncertain_fields.0x2B-0x36: Post-header block: contains u32(3), u16(0x006E=110), u16(entry_count), u16(0), u8(0x10=16). Entry counts: 112 (era), 141 (classic), 242 (retail).

entry_observations.key_size: 16 bytes (0x10), consistent with TACT key sizes
entry_observations.entry_content: Each entry contains at least one 16-byte key, offset/size fields, and a flag byte
entry_observations.repeated_key_pattern: Some 16-byte keys repeat at stride 61 (0x3D), suggesting entries may reference a common patch archive key
